name: A pair of obsidian bracers
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It decreases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It decreases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users fire resistance adequately.
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
